author: leosimons
msg: Add support for creating nested non-existent directories to the mkdir builder, and add a supporting testcase.

author: shash
msg: Fixes: DefaultThreadPool extends ThreadGroup. When it is created and added to parent ThreadGroup, ThreadGroup holds reference to it. When dispose is called, parent ThreadGroup still has reference to it and garbage collector can not collect it. It causes memory leak.

author: leosimons
msg: * metadata/README.txt: reference giraffe.xml as a test profile

author: shash
msg: Fixes: There is a small timing window between the time the worker thread has finished executing and before a call to the finish() method of the ThreadControl is made. This can cause the threads waiting on a join(0) to never wake-up.
